text: Alfonso Lacadena García-Gallo (21 August 1964 - 9 February 2018), was a Spanish researcher of Mayan subjects. He was born in Zaragoza, Aragón, Spain. He was a known specialist in his writing, epigraphy, and in the deciphering of his texts and professor at the Complutense University of Madrid in the department of Anthropology of America. Lacadena died on 9 February 2018 of lymphoma in Madrid at the age of 63.Hoy, 9 de Febrero de 2018, falleció en Madrid, el Dr. Alfonso Lacadena García-Gallo. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Spanish writers Category:Spanish academics Category:European anthropologists
title: Alfonso Lacadena
